Pre-Game Insights: Brazil coach Dorival Júnior is expected to give more playing time to Botafogo strikers Igor Jesus and Luiz Henrique.
Júnior could be set to use Flamengo midfielder Gerson as a replacement for the suspended Lucas Paquetá.
Right back Vanderson is expected to replace Danilo, and midfielder André is expected to take the place of Bruno Guimarães.
President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva suggested that more local players should be featured in the national team.
